text:
Does anyone know if srcset works in dnd image hubl for the new drag and drop system? Example:
```{% dnd_module path='@HubSpot/image',
        img={
          'alt': 'image alt text',
          'size_type': 'auto',
          'src': get_asset_url('../images/temp-graphic.jpg'),
          'srcset'="../images/temp-graphic@2x.jpg 2x,
             ../images/temp-graphic@3x.jpg 3x"
        },
        offset=6,
        width=6
      %}```
it you define your image width, I think HS does it for you
Otherwise, youâ€™ll need to create a custom module
